heading: Heathenâ€™s Keep Dungeon Guide
content: Heathen's Keep hosts dangerous Revenants which can stun you by driving their sword into you. Otherwise, it is an easy clear with a straightforward layout. It is somewhat strong for farming, but not currently a possible . The Blood Bishop is easy to defeat, only having one annoying stun attack where it attempts to capture you. You can avoid this with Evade or another mobility skill just before the attack completes. This dungeon unlocks the , a decent defensive aspect for Barbarians. While every dungeon has a somewhat randomized layout, there are patterns to where objectives and bosses are located. This map will help you identify those layouts so you can complete dungeons faster and maximize your XP and loot per hour! Reviewed by
